title: How to learn flask
content: flask (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat. flask is a prototype-based, multi-paradigm, single-threaded, dynamic language, supporting
author: Sahil Pillania
